fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Interrogate (Night): Interrogate someone to find someone’s faction. This is affected by frames.
-Brutal Interrogate (Night): Interrogate someone. You will roleblock them and find their exact role. 2 uses.
-Scout (Day): Determine how many members of any given faction are alive. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Brutal Interrogate will not roleblock if Everfrost is in the game. Scout will refund a use if the faction doesn’t exist, but you will not be able to use it for the rest of the day.
